# Discord Bot - FiveManage Image Uploader

## Project Overview
Discord bot that automatically uploads images to FiveManage.com API when users post images in Discord channels.

## Tech Stack
- Node.js
- discord.js v14
- axios for HTTP requests
- form-data for file uploads
